sentences.english: I took them to Haidian Park, they immediately attracted the little kids' attention.
sentences.chinese: 我带他们去海淀公园，立即吸引了小朋友的注意力。

sentences.english: There’re lots of good bars and clubs in the Haidian area.
sentences.chinese: 在海淀有很多很好的酒吧和俱乐部。

sentences.english: Yuanmingyuan located at Beijing haidian district, west, eastern.
sentences.chinese: 圆明园位于北京市西郊，海淀区东部。

sentences.english: Shouwang church is a house church in Haidian district, Beijing. Wang Jing / China Daily
sentences.chinese: 守望教会是北京海淀区的一个家庭教会。

sentences.english: A: I went to a club in Haidian with some friends.
sentences.chinese: 我和几个朋友去了海淀的一家俱乐部。

sentences.english: Beijing Longquan Monastery is situated in the Phoenix Range Scenic Area, northwest of the Haidian District of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京龙泉寺位于海淀区西北边，凤凰岭风景区内。

sentences.english: There're lots of good bars and clu in the Haidian area.
sentences.chinese: 在海淀有很多很好的酒吧和俱乐部。

sentences.english: The experimental class is exposed to cooperative learning approach for one semester.
sentences.chinese: 其研究对象是海淀区实验小学三年级两个班。

sentences.english: It is located in the Haidian district of the north-west suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 新建筑物位于市西北郊海淀区。

sentences.english: B: There're lots of good bars and clubs in the Haidian area.
sentences.chinese: 在海淀有很多很好的酒吧和俱乐部。

sentences.english: Zhongguancun North Ave, Haidian, Next to the Beijing University Science Park.
sentences.chinese: 中关村北大街127号，海淀区，北大科技园附近。

sentences.english: Beijing Haidian District, 20-year-old girl looking for work, reception class bar.
sentences.chinese: 北京海淀区找工作女孩20岁，前台接待类的吧。

sentences.english: We forecast the load of Haidian district in Zhongguan village.
sentences.chinese: 针对中关村海淀园地区进行了负荷猜测。

sentences.english: My address is 29, Xue Yuan Road, Hai Dian District, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 我的地址是北京市海淀区学院路29号。

sentences.english: It's 12 A Wanshou Road Haidian District Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京市海淀区万寿路甲12号。
我的地址是海淀区学院路15号。
